introduction: Search company accordingly given parameter Search company accordingly given parameter Search company accordingly given parameter Search company accordingly given parameter Search company accordingly given parameter Search company accordingly given parameter Search company accordingly given parameter Search company accordingly given parameter Search company accordingly given parameter Search company accordingly given parameter Search company accordingly given parameter Search company accordingly given parameter

data.name: created
data.description: to get company by their creation date range(format- from,to)

data.name: onboard_date
data.description: to get company by their onboarding date range(format- from,to)

data.name: first_login
data.description: to get company by their first login date range(format- from,to)

data.name: lastLogin
data.description: to get company by their recent login date range(format- from,to)

data.name: totalvents
description: integer- to get companies having integer totalEvents
integer+ - to get companies having more than integer totalEvents
integer1,integer2 - to get companies having totalEvents between integer1 integer2

data.name: upcomingEvents
description: integer- to get companies having integer upcomingEvents
integer+ - to get companies having more than integer upcomingEvents
integer1,integer2 - to get companies having upcomingEvents between integer1 integer2

data.name: totalLeads
description: integer- to get companies having integer totalLeads
integer+ - to get companies having more than integer totalLeads
integer1,integer2 - to get companies having totalLeads between integer1 integer2

data.name: level
description: integer- to get companies having integer level
integer+ - to get companies having more than integer level
integer1,integer2 - to get companies having level between integer1 integer2

data.name: published
data.description: default it wil show all(published & unpublished)

data.name: user
data.description: to get list of companies a perticular user associated with

data.name: promotionType
data.description: integer- to get companies having integer membership  integer+ - to get companies having more than integer membership 1+ - to get all companies having some membership

data.name: event
data.description: return company associated with that perticular event

data.name: city
data.description: Multiple cities are accepted seprated by comma

data.name: country
data.description: Multiple country iso are accepted seprated by comma
